column1: HIMALAYA Anti-Hair Fall Shampoo, (1 L),Anti-hair Fall Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types Composition: The herbs Butea Frondosa and Bhringaraja stimulate hair follicle growth and are effective in strengthening hair roots and controlling hair fall,"In this day and age, several factors can affect the health of your hair. Some of the most common hair problems faced these days are hair fall, dandruff, damaged Hair, frizzy hair, split ends, dry hair, rough hair, etc. Our shampoo significantly reduces itchiness and provides long lasting relief to the scalp. It cleans the scalp and protects it from infections & dryness. Himalaya Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is enriched with the goodness of Tea Tree Oil & Aloe Vera, which are known to remove up to 100% dandruff and prevent it from coming back. Use Himalaya Anti-Dandruff Conditioner after shampoo for best results.","Applied For

column2: The herbs Butea Frondosa and Bhringaraja stimulate hair follicle growth and are effective in strengthening hair roots and controlling hair fall

1",packing was not good ..i baught in 365 ...1 ltr quality :- very nice packaging... m always Himalaya lover.. I love this shampoo.. I got it for 317.. very reasonable :- Best price at offer loved it,positive,0.5666095614433289

column1: L'Oréal Paris Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo with Keratin XS (1 L),Damage Repair Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types,"5 Problems.1 Solution. L'Oreal Paris Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo helps fight against the five visible signs of damaged hair - Hair fall, dryness, roughness, dullness and split ends without weighing it down. Damaged hair can lack the natural cement which keeps the hair strong and resilient. To ensure cohesion and strength, the L'Oreal Laboratories have created Ceramide-Cement technology to replicate the hair's natural cement, targeting the 5 problems. Explore our best hair products to revive and repair damaged hair. Highlights: 1. Helps fight against the five visible signs of damaged hair - hair fall, dryness, roughness, dullness, and split ends 2. Shampoo for damaged hair 3. With Protein + Ceramide 4. Fights the 5 signs of damage.","Applied For

column1: Kesh King Organic Onion Shampoo with Curry Leaves | Boosts Hair Growth (600 ml),"Anti-hair Fall, Deep Conditioning, Dryness Care, Hair Shine, Nourishment & Moisturization, Scalp Cleansing, Straightening & Smoothening Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types Composition: Each 10 ml contains extracts of: Allium cepa (Piyaja) Sd. 51.5 mg, Aloe barbadensis (Aloe vera) Lf., Symplocos racemosa (Lodhra) St.Bk., Terminalia chebula (Haritaki) Fr., Terminalia belerica (Bibhitaka) Fr. 25.75 mg each, Emblica officinalis (Amalaki) Dr.Fr. 51.5 mg, Ocimum sanctum (Tulasi) Wh.Pl. 15.45 mg, Acacia concinna (Shikakai) Pod., Rubia condifolia (Bhringaraja) Rt., Nardostachys jatamansi (Jatamansi) Rz., Zizyphus mauritiana (Kola) Lf., Lawsonia inermis (Henna) Lf., Mesua ferrea (Nagakesara) Fl., Cyperus rotundus (Musta) Rz., Trigonella foenum-graecum (Methi) Sd., Centella asiatica (Mandukparni) Wh.Pl., Tribulus terrestris (Goksura) Fr. 10.30 mg each, Azadirachta indica (Neem) Lf. 11.33 mg, Pongamia pinnata (Karanja) seed oil 1.03 mg, Citrus limon (Lemon) oil, Ocimum basilicum (Tulasi) oil, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) leaf oil 0.01 mg each; Sugandhit dravya. Excipients: Base q.q.; Preservatives: DMDM Hydantoin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone (and) Methylisothiazolinone","Emami Kesh King Scalp and Hair Medicine Ayurvedic Hairfall Expert Onion Shampoo. Reduce hairfall and Boost hair growth with Kesh King Onion Shampoo. This unique and potent ayurvedic formula is filled with the goodness of Onion and 21 Ayurvedic Herbs which reduces hairfall, boosts hair growth and makes hair silky, shiny and smooth. It is filled with fragrance of flowers. Kesh King Onion Shampoo is Paraben and Phthalate free, contains no artificial colours, is cruelty free and FDA approved. For best results, use with Kesh King Onion Oil and Conditioner. With 21 Herbs & Fragrance of Flowers. Reduces Hairfall. Boosts Hair Growth. Makes hair silky, shiny and smooth.","Applied For

column1: WOW SKIN SCIENCE Red Onion Black Seed Oil Shampoo With Red Onion Seed Oil Extract, Black Seed Oil & Pro-Vitamin B5 - No Parabens, Sulphates, Silicones, Color & Peg, 1000 ml (1 L),Anti-hair Fall Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types,"Tackle hair loss, scalp buildups and dull, weak hair with WOW Skin Science Red Onion Black Seed Oil Shampoo. The shampoo, formulated with natural ingredients, helps strengthen hair follicles and clarify blocked roots. Suitable for all hair types, this shampoo cleanses and moisturizes your hair and scalp and helps to improve hair texture. It is infused with red onion extract with strong antioxidant properties that help protect the scalp and hair, promotes blood circulation to the roots. Black seed oil rich in fatty acids nourishes scalp and roots. Sweet almond oil keeps the scalp and hair conditioned. It can be used to hydrate the roots and scalp and help make hair look healthy and lustrous.","Applied For

column1: DOVE Hair Fall Rescue Shampoo (340 ml),Anti-hair Fall Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types Composition: Ingredients: On Tag,"

column2: You know what’s one of the greatest worries women have? It’s hair fall. And seeing hair strands in our comb can be daunting. That’s why Dove brings you this hair fall rescue shampoo. Combat hair fall and add some bounce to your hair by using this shampoo.
Apart from combating hair fall, this shampoo deeply nourishes damaged hair from root to tip and makes hair visibly fuller.
This shampoo is so gentle that you can use it every day.

1","good shampoo in terms of silky hair. But if u buy this for hairfall rescue, it will work for that too... it will rescue you from hairfall permanently by making you bald. I have been using for 4-5 years.  its texture is so creamy. Me & My mom both are using dove shampoo. It's give us shiny nd smooth Hair. Love it 😍 :- Nice product flipkart delivery is very fast and good packagingthis is very good fragrance and nice smell hairfall is now stopped little bit",positive,0.48751282691955566

column1: Plum Coconut Milk & Peptides strength & shine shampoo | Smoothens strands (250 ml),"Daily Care, Damage Repair, Softening & Silkening, Dryness Care, Frizz Control, Hair Shine Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types","It takes just 3 minutes to get shiny and strong hair! Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

• Coconut Milk – An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair’s natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
• Pea Peptide – They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For
column2: Daily Care, Damage Repair, Softening & Silkening, Dryness Care, Frizz Control, Hair Shine

column1: Plum Coconut Milk & Peptides strength & shine shampoo | Smoothens strands (250 ml),"Daily Care, Damage Repair, Softening & Silkening, Dryness Care, Frizz Control, Hair Shine Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types","It takes just 3 minutes to get shiny and strong hair! Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

• Coconut Milk – An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair’s natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
• Pea Peptide – They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For
column2: Daily Care, Damage Repair, Softening & Silkening, Dryness Care, Frizz Control, Hair Shine

1","Very nice shampoo worth money...After one wash my hair was very shine and silky ....Super shampoo i love it :- Same as ayur coconut shampoo, but only difference ayur shampoo is cheaper cost than plum coconut shampoo.....not recommended anyone....better buy ayur coconut shampoo instead of this :- ok product",positive,0.5887739658355713

column1: Kesh King Organic Onion Shampoo with Curry Leaves | Boosts Hair Growth (600 ml),"Anti-hair Fall, Deep Conditioning, Dryness Care, Hair Shine, Nourishment & Moisturization, Scalp Cleansing, Straightening & Smoothening Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types Composition: Each 10 ml contains extracts of: Allium cepa (Piyaja) Sd. 51.5 mg, Aloe barbadensis (Aloe vera) Lf., Symplocos racemosa (Lodhra) St.Bk., Terminalia chebula (Haritaki) Fr., Terminalia belerica (Bibhitaka) Fr. 25.75 mg each, Emblica officinalis (Amalaki) Dr.Fr. 51.5 mg, Ocimum sanctum (Tulasi) Wh.Pl. 15.45 mg, Acacia concinna (Shikakai) Pod., Rubia condifolia (Bhringaraja) Rt., Nardostachys jatamansi (Jatamansi) Rz., Zizyphus mauritiana (Kola) Lf., Lawsonia inermis (Henna) Lf., Mesua ferrea (Nagakesara) Fl., Cyperus rotundus (Musta) Rz., Trigonella foenum-graecum (Methi) Sd., Centella asiatica (Mandukparni) Wh.Pl., Tribulus terrestris (Goksura) Fr. 10.30 mg each, Azadirachta indica (Neem) Lf. 11.33 mg, Pongamia pinnata (Karanja) seed oil 1.03 mg, Citrus limon (Lemon) oil, Ocimum basilicum (Tulasi) oil, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) leaf oil 0.01 mg each; Sugandhit dravya. Excipients: Base q.q.; Preservatives: DMDM Hydantoin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone (and) Methylisothiazolinone","Emami Kesh King Scalp and Hair Medicine Ayurvedic Hairfall Expert Onion Shampoo. column1: HIMALAYA Anti-Hair Fall Shampoo, (1 L),Anti-hair Fall Shampoo Ideal For: Men & Women Suitable For: All Hair Types Composition: The herbs Butea Frondosa and Bhringaraja stimulate hair follicle growth and are effective in strengthening hair roots and controlling hair fall,"In this day and age, several factors can affect the health of your hair. Some of the most common hair problems faced these days are hair fall, dandruff, damaged Hair, frizzy hair, split ends, dry hair, rough hair, etc. Our shampoo significantly reduces itchiness and provides long lasting relief to the scalp. It cleans the scalp and protects it from infections & dryness. Himalaya Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is enriched with the goodness of Tea Tree Oil & Aloe Vera, which are known to remove up to 100% dandruff and prevent it from coming back. Use Himalaya Anti-Dandruff Conditioner after shampoo for best results.","Applied For
